TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY )
